name: Out Upon the Ice
description:
Unfinished lil solo project, built with Godot. A text-based survival game to which - due to some excellent time management on my part - the text was not uploaded. Oh dear.

On the plus side though, the animation is working great! Hit Spacebar to play it and imagine what could have been, I guess? This is actually the first game jam I've made an (even partial) submission to, so thanks for taking the time to look at it.
